Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Under new management, but just as good.   I have visited on at least one trip each year to the Netherlands for over 10 years and have always loved their food.  I have taken family and colleagues; everyone loves this place.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Really tasty Indonesian food. Must try the iga bakar domba and the soto ayam which were both delicious and hearty. The mains are served with a portion of rice and also come with two side salads (gado-gado and a mango salad) as well as fried ‚Ä¶

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Amazing! Had a traditional rice table here with a friend and have to say every single thing served was just delicious. One of the nicest meals I've ever had. The flavours and offerings were completely different to anything I've tried. Really good value for money and the staff were lovely. Cannot recommend enough!

Name: Indrapura
Review Text:
Great Indonesian dining experience
Service was excellent, the food was good, and the place felt very nice - they even have a love piano player
Relatively expansive

Name: Indrapura
Review Text:
Located on the Rembrandtplein, this place is a must try.

We took a break from Dutch food to try Dutch Indonesian food. ‚Ä¶

Name: Indrapura
Review Text:
We experiences the worse welcoming at Indrapure.

When we arrived at the door, a long older grey haired owner/waiter walked ‚Ä¶

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: We snuck into this place off Rembrandt Square on a whim, as we‚Äôd heard that one should have Indonesian food while in Amsterdam. As early eaters (between 5pm and 8pm, though I‚Äôd check on the door first), we were valid for the 25% discount on ‚Ä¶

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Visited Indrapura for the 3rd time recently, and each time we have enjoyed the food thoroughly. I would prefer to visit around 6.30, since i) the place is not that busy and ii) you get a discount of nearly 30% on rijstaffel. Even though I am vegeterian they have decent options in rijstaffels.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: We had a feast here and must have tried almost everything on the menu. All very flavor full. Clean restaurant and excellent service

Name: Indrapura
Review Text:
Really nice restaurant with a gourgeous view, if you get a table by the window.
The food was unexpectedly tasty, we had the lamb options, and the extras they bring with the main course are quite savory and generous, offering a variety of tastes.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Food was really unique and amazing! Atmosphere was also nice. Loved it very much and would love to go back again!

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Awesome place, great atmosphere and very very good Indonesian food. Service is super

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: I'm Indonesian living in Indonesia, so you ought to believe me when I said that the food here is really delicious! They serve Indonesian food at its best...

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: This is not fine dining, it is a ok buffet at best. Staff , however is great! Very pleasant and friendly.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Great food and wonderful service. Be sure to go with a group to get the sharing dishes - I recommend the lobster one, delicious.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Wonderful restaurant! Very friendly and welcoming staff - they even have a piano player! Have been multiple times,  food is always absolutely delicious - we usually go for one of the rijstafels, and I think every dish over the last 3 or 4 visits has been great.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Excellent food, ambience and the owner is amazing person.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Friendly staff, easy to find and located in busy district. The rice table offered wide selection.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Enjoyed the food, the atmosphere and the service.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Food was great, however after telling them 3 times that there were a couple of people with severe nut allergies they brought out two dishes with peanuts in. The manager was quite abrupt and asked if we trusted him in a rather demanding ‚Ä¶

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Absolutely delicious! Fantastic food

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Rice table is really good but service was slow

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Friendly service, pretty pricey with dishes starting over 20 euros. Good rice table with many items ranging from spicey to mild. We got the lamb rice table for me and my girlfriend and had a hard time finishing all the food. Would recommend stopping for the rice table but I would try somewhere new before going back here.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Very poor services. We made reservation in advance. The person who welcomed us is not welcoming and only great us at the entrance without directing us to our table. Left us clueless. Our table wasn't set up for us. ‚Ä¶

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Everything. And once again I'll type it... EVERYTHING  they served was outstanding. The lamb itself was worth the price of the entire dinner, but one beautifully plated dish after another (tapas style) made for a perfect, PERFECT meal. ‚Ä¶

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Low quality food. The wonton had raw fillings and had to be recooked.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Below average Indonesian restaurant - rice table offering was disappointing : no spice, no kick, but lots of bland vegetables. Restaurant was big, airy and lacked atmosphere. Staff were very friendly, but let down by the food.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Incredibly good food! We had such an amazing dinner here. What a unique experience, ordering the rice table. Would highly recommend this to anyone visiting Amsterdam. Is better with more people (4+) so you can all share the food. The only ‚Ä¶

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Lovely Indonesian restaurant serving great food with millions of condiments. You order a main dish of any meat or seafood and it comes with rice and other small plates like salad, aubergines, potatoes etc. One main is pretty filling for two ‚Ä¶

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: First of i would like to take a moment and say from the bottom of my heart that is one of the best restaurants I've ever been,the flavours are out of this world and personally i was in heaven for a few moments! Although am allergic to ‚Ä¶

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: This is the best advice I can give anyone going here to sample Indonesian food - get the RICE TABLE!  Its a flavor sensation party for your mouth.  Try so many thing in one order, well worth the money and if we are ever back in Amsterdam this will be on the must do list.  Well done Indrapura xo

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Came here with four people. We tried to look up a menu online first but there doesn‚Äôt appear to be one. We were shocked upon arrival at the prices - around ‚Ç¨25 for a main. We ordered wines, three entrees and two mains. A guy came up and ‚Ä¶

Name: Indrapura
Review Text:
Delicious food and friendly staff

1 missing staff for price, we ordered around 3 starters and 2 main courses for ‚Ä¶

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Food was amazing but the manager did not treat us like other customers are we were young guests (aged 23--26). Compared to older adults where he showed them to their own table, took their orders and jackets etc. GREAT food though!

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Excellent service and generous portions of food! We ordered from the ala carte menu, and the side dishes that came with it were great too. ‚Ä¶

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: An excellent Indonesian restaurant close to Rembrandtplein in the heart of Amsterdam. I ordered the Rijstafel and enjoyed the variety of spicy meat dishes and vegetarian options available. There is a reasonably priced wine list to accompany ‚Ä¶

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: I experienced the worst service out of any restaurant I‚Äôve ever been to at Indrapura. I was dining with friends and the waiter made a mistake and never brought my food. After being alerted to the mistake, it took over a half hour for my ‚Ä¶

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Amazing Indonesian food, great atmosphere, warm/kind service. Don't discount it because its in the touristy section of Rembrandtplein - it was one of the best meals I've ever had in Amsterdam. Get the Indrapura rijstafel!

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: I have never left a negative review in my life and I do realize that this is not a Fine dining  restaurant, but dear me, I also think that you can expect some sort of standard when you go out to eat. ‚Ä¶

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: We booked a reservation for 17 people, they forced us to split into two tables (one for 8 and the other for 9 people). They also forced us to get a fixed menu for 31‚Ç¨/person (drinks not included) as we were a "big group". We decided to go away.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Indrapura is a wonderful place with a great atmosphere.The staff was very friendly and helpful. The food was quite tasty & well cooked (I've had indonesian food in Bali and this is actually better). I loved the lobster and the lamb chops, ‚Ä¶

Name: Indrapura
Review Text:
We had an unpleasant experience at this restaurant that we thought needs to be shared with others in order to avoid the situation.
In our last day in Amsterdam, four of us did want to try out some Indonesian ‚Ä¶

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: I grew up in Indonesia and I loved Indonesian food..today after many years of staying away from Indonesia, I was delighted to taste flavourful Indonesian food, surprisingly, in Amsterdam. We ordered Sate Ayam, Gado Gado and Ayam Rajak and ‚Ä¶

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Awesome rice plate menu. Absolutely delicious. Charming and comfortable atmosphere. A really nice change from some of the touristy joints nearby.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Delicious Indonesian food. Great atmosphere and the wait staff were very helpful. We were with a party of 6 and not disappointed. Great food, great service, great location.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: I come often at this restaurant, all the food is very delicious my favorite food in this restaurant is the Medan spiced lobster it tastes so amazing.  the place is also very pleasant

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Very arrogant manager asked us to leave if we didn't order 2 main courses, he said they are the most expensive Indonesian restaurant and they need to pay rent, so if we didn't order what they want us to order we had to leave.  Very arrogant attitude, poor people's skills. Don't go there, don't support their arrogance.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Food was ok, nothing to write home about though.  Charged for items we did not receive from a set menu and when this was pointed out, the manager blamed me for not mentioning it earlier. Charged full price despite not receiving at least 3 of the protein dishes. Not impressed.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Absolutely amazing food, Special prawns were really great. Only issue was food is served bit late, I guess cooking requires time. Really peaceful place to enjoy your food.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Indrapura is a beautifully decorated and warm restaurant located at Rembrandtplein in Amsterdam. The service is fast and friendly. The menu has a great selection and quality of the food is ok. For Westerners it will be a great experience, ‚Ä¶

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Nice place, friendly atmosphere and excellent indonesian food! Good value if you check the different discounts (25-30%) available (and make sure they apply them correctly on the bill!)

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Never having eaten an Indonesian meal before perhaps we are not the best judges but in my opinion as long as you embrace spicy this was excellent.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Considering this place is right smack in the middle of the popular Rembrandt square, I was expecting the usual terrible tourist-esque restaurant treatment. Nothing could however be further from the truth. This place is absolutely terrific! ‚Ä¶

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Mid century modern decor. INDONESIAN rice table "rijsttafel". Restaurant of exceptional quality.  The peanut sause is sweetly delicious.   Proportions are generous,  food is delightful and the price is a nice break from the Amsterdam usual.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Great food, very tasty. Very good service.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: The Indonesian food here was very good. I had lunch here and would totally do it again if I was in the neighborhood, better than the surrounding restaurants and the food seemed like it was home-made and fresh.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: If you haven't had Indonesian food before, you'll probably enjoy the food here. If you have, there are much better Indonesian places in Amsterdam. The staff aren't friendly from our experience.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Delicious, highly recommend! Thought price was a little high until I experienced the wonderful food! Friendly staff too, great service!

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Very delicious food. Lamb chops and chicken satay were great. Friendly service. Live piano player.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Absolutely wonderful food and service. Could not recommend more. You'll get great value for your money. Coconut ice cream was out of this world üòÇ

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Tablecloths are not changed regularly, therefore, there are food stains everywhere. Food is good and authentic. If you do not mind dirty tablecloths, go for it. Not a repeat visit for me.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Amazing food and the waiter was incredibly friendly, gave me a few new places to checkout! Overall a great experience

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Very nice place to have a great meal. Piano playing in the background with a nice atmosphere to the place is really nice. Staff is friendly and the food is good. Should try it

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: It's a nice restaurant, the food is good and plentyful, but we ate better meals for less money in most other places.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text:
My favourite Indonesian in Amsterdam.

Rice tables are awesome. Life music on weekends. ‚Ä¶

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Excellent food! If you come in and leave before I pm there is a 25% discount and we didnt have to waot either. Highly recommend!

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: A tourist trap where they offer a discount at the door but don't honour it. Nice food though but the service has a lot of room for improvement.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: We entered on chance without a reservation and the staff was quick and very helpful. The food was delicious and our only disappointment was that we were full too soon.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Ordered a ricetable, 35Euro/p for eight people, got food for about 5-6 people, went home still hungry. Waited 1.5 hours for the food to arrive. Not happy at all.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Great food, service and prices for what you get. Will be back again. Suggestion - make a reservation.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: Superb service, great ricetable, good viewing of the rembrandt square, can recommend it for family or couples.... Go before 7pm, 25%discount. So good people were being turned away after 8pm.

Name: Indrapura
Review Text: The taste of the food and the service is very poor and bad. The food is very expensive and not woth for money . And i am going to give 0 star for this restaurant
